properties.displayName: MDE Alert - System executable renamed and launched
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where AlertName == "System executable renamed and launched"
| where MitreTechnique == "T1036;T1036.003"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - System executable renamed and launched
